categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Lone Wolf: A Tale of Obi-Wan and Luke

"Lone Wolf: A Tale of Obi-Wan and Luke" is a short story written by Abel G. Peña and published by StarWars.com in 2015. It was attached to Peña's other lost story, SkyeWalkers: A Clone Wars Story. The story takes place in the immediate aftermath of Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith.

Peña revealed that the story was inspired by the seminal anime Lone Wolf and Cub and was originally to be published in Star Wars Insider as part of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope's 30th anniversary.
